casebody.data:
No. 448,

Misc.

Chessman v. California. A. L. Wirin, Fred Okrand, Rosalie S. Asher and George T. Davis for petitioner. Stanley Mosk, Attorney General of California, and Arlo E. Smith, Deputy Attorney General, for respondent. Loren Miller filed a brief on behalf of -the American Civil Liberties Union of Southern California, as amicus curiae, in support of the petition.

Supreme Court of California. Certiorari denied.

The Chief Justice took no part in the consideration or decision of this application.
